title: trumpet like flare to a square serif, thick and thin
author: doublethreat

comments.content:
We are replacing some missing characters to this sign, need a font ID. Thanks!  
-db

Provided with Microsoft Office, at least some versions of Office.  
Don

Footlight has an unusual R, with the stroke for the bowl descending from the stem.  
I found three other serif fonts with this design feature: University Roman, FF Ankoon and P22 Alpha Roman.  
I was wondering what other serif fonts, if any, deal with R in a similar manner.  
Thanks.  
Don
Satyr and Faunus, but very subtly.

Thanks Frode for the find.  
Subtle indeed, but it's there.  
Very attractive original contemporary typefaces. Good explanations at the Monokrom website.  
Don
